attributes.action: Worcester Flooding, Please Dredge River Severn
attributes.additional_details:
After the recent flooding across the country Worcester as well as many other parts of the country has been badly affected.

Many people would like to see the re introduction of dredging the River Severn in effort to reduce the amount of disruption caused by flooding. And decrease the time that it wakes for Worcester to resume normality.

Please sign this petition to help the people of Worcester and hopefully people further afield.
